abstract: The gay couple featured in Hillary Rodham Clinton’s presidential announcement video have married, and The Times’s Weddings section looks at their relationship.

headline.main: A Wedding for Couple in Hillary Clinton Announcement Video

snippet: The gay couple featured in Hillary Rodham Clinton’s presidential announcement video have married, and The Times’s Weddings section looks at their relationship.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
